attributes.name: players
attributes.description: Stores an array of all the players on the page.

attributes.name: screenfull-loaded
attributes.description: Is the screenfull library loaded and screenfull constant set.

properties.name: players
properties.description: Stores an array of all the players on the page.

properties.name: screenfullLoaded
properties.description: Is the screenfull library loaded and screenfull constant set.

attributes.name: action
attributes.description: is button action to send as an event

properties.name: action
properties.description: is button action to send as an event

attributes.name: fixed-height
attributes.description: Is the player a fixed height (iframe mode) so that theure is no transcript toggle?

attributes.name: hide-transcript-button
attributes.description: hide the transcript toggle menu item?

attributes.name: no-printing
attributes.description: hide the print transcript feature available?

attributes.name: no-transcript-toggle
attributes.description: Is the transctipt toggle feature available?

attributes.name: responsive-size
attributes.description: Size of the a11y media element for responsive styling

properties.name: fixedHeight
properties.description: Is the player a fixed height (iframe mode) so that theure is no transcript toggle?

properties.name: hideTranscriptButton
properties.description: hide the transcript toggle menu item?

properties.name: noPrinting
properties.description: hide the print transcript feature available?

properties.name: noTranscriptToggle
properties.description: Is the transctipt toggle feature available?

properties.name: responsiveSize
properties.description: Size of the a11y media element for responsive styling

attributes.name: media-lang
attributes.description: the language of the media (if different from user interface language)

attributes.name: seekable
attributes.description: the seekable range of the media

properties.name: mediaLang
properties.description: the language of the media (if different from user interface language)

properties.name: seekable
properties.description: the seekable range of the media

attributes.name: disabled
attributes.description: disable interactive mode that makes the transcript clickable

properties.name: disabled
properties.description: disable interactive mode that makes the transcript clickable

attributes.name: disable-interactive
attributes.description: disable interactive mode that makes the transcript clickable

attributes.name: hide-timestamps
attributes.description: show cue's start and end time

attributes.name: status
attributes.description: the status of the transcript loading

properties.name: disableInteractive
properties.description: disable interactive mode that makes the transcript clickable

properties.name: hideTimestamps
properties.description: show cue's start and end time

properties.name: status
properties.description: the status of the transcript loading

attributes.name: api-ready
attributes.description: whether or not the YouTube API is ready

attributes.name: counter
attributes.description: a counter for creating unique ideas for each YouTube player container

properties.name: apiReady
properties.description: whether or not the YouTube API is ready

properties.name: counter
properties.description: a counter for creating unique ideas for each YouTube player container

attributes.name: allow-concurrent
attributes.description:
Allow this media to play concurrently with other a11y-media-players?
Default is to pause this a11y-media-player when other a11y-media-player starts playing.

attributes.name: audio-no-thumb
attributes.description: Is it an audio player with no thumbnail?

attributes.name: dark-transcript
attributes.description: Use dark theme on transcript? Default is false, even when player is dark.

attributes.name: disable-interactive
attributes.description: disable interactive mode that makes the transcript clickable

attributes.name: flex-layout
attributes.description: Determines if video and transcript are in a flex layout

attributes.name: hide-timestamps
attributes.description: show cue's start and end time

attributes.name: media-caption
attributes.description: The default media caption if none is given.

attributes.name: media-lang
attributes.description: the language of the media (if different from user interface language)

attributes.name: print-caption
attributes.description: The media caption that displays when the page is printed.

attributes.name: responsive-size
attributes.description: Size of the a11y media element for responsive styling

attributes.name: sticky
attributes.description: Is the video currently sticky, i.e. it is fixed to the corner when playing but scrolled off screen?

attributes.name: sticky-corner
attributes.description:
When playing but scrolled off screen, to which corner does it "stick":
top-left, top-right, bottom-left, bottom-right, or none?
Default is "top-right". "None" disables stickiness.
